title: Understanding Data Terminology
text: In databases, information about each individual or item is stored in a specific format. This format is often referred to by a particular term.

title: Think About Database Structure
text: Consider how data is organized in a database. Each entry for a person or item is stored in a specific way. What is this entry called?

title: Identify the Correct Term
text: In a database, each entry that contains data about a person or item is known as a...
